com.salimov.yurii.dao.interfaces

Interface CategoryDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentDao<Category,java.lang.Long>, DataDao<Category,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryDaoImpl

    public interface CategoryDao
extends ContentDao<Category,java.lang.Long>
    The interface provides a set of standard methods for working Category objects with a database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CategoryDaoImpl, ContentDao, Category

      java.util.List<Category> getBySectionId(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns categories with the parameter section id from a database.

        java.util.List<Category> getBySectionId(java.lang.Long id)
